title: Screen Eye Protection
description:
Screen Eye Protection is newly upgraded, and the intelligent eye protection function is launched (according to the ambient brightness and time) to automatically adjust the screen brightness and filters, allowing you to experience a new automated eye protection method.

Screen Eye Protection App: An ultra-lightweight vision eye protection software, suitable for mobile phones and tablets. It effectively filters the blue light radiation of the screen at night and reduces the flicker frequency through the multi-scene eye protection screen theme (similar to wallpaper). At the same time, the App also provides a large number of vision training mini-games, eye brightness reminders and other professional functions to protect your eye health.

📱What are everyone using screen eye protection for?
【Night】
* Turn on the brightness reminder to avoid long-term use of mobile phones in dark environments to reduce the risk of myopia, glaucoma, and dry eye disease
*Turn on the night filter to minimize the blue light radiation caused by using mobile phones and tablets at night
* Check the eye protection data for a day, the App will summarize it into daily/annual records, and can also share it with friends, giving you more motivation to insist on eye protection.

【Noon】
* Turn on smart eye protection to automatically switch filters and brightness according to the environment and time of day
*The surrounding environment during outdoor activities has high illumination. Turn on the outdoor filter to make your eyes more comfortable.
*Take a nap at noon and start with a set of vision training to maximize eye protection efficiency

【Morning】
*When studying/working in the morning, turn on fatigue reminder and push it regularly, which is more conducive to maintaining eyesight.
* If you have heavy work/study work, turn on the reading filter and your eyes will not be tired after long hours of use.

🔋What wonderful features has Screen Eye Protection prepared for you——
【Multiple eye protection modes】
*Customized eye protection filter themes based on the color temperature of multiple scenes of learning to read, reading novels, playing games, watching short videos, and sleeping;
*You can also customize your own exclusive eye protection filters to effectively protect your eyes and treat eye fatigue.

【Eye reminder in multiple scenes】
*Fatigue reminder: strong reminder at regular intervals, put down your phone/tablet and let your eyes have a good rest;
*Brightness reminder: Reminder according to the ambient illumination. Use your eyes in a suitable environment to avoid hurting your eyes.

【Various vision training】
*Professional eye protection training, people with moderate to low myopia to those prone to eye fatigue can find suitable eye training for themselves.

⏰Surprise benefits you can’t miss! ! !
The exclusive 7-day membership privileges for new users are now being distributed, and more practical functions are being continuously updated.
Screen Eye Protection is a development-based App. Your suggestions and praise are the driving force for us to move forward. If you have any questions and feedback, please contact:eyeprotection@163.com

summary: Intelligent eye protection for detecting environmental brightness duration
